create a new social container and hook it up to the social directory under development

To create a new social container and connect it to your social directory under development, you'll want to use Docker. Here's how you can approach this:

First, navigate to your development directory and ensure you have a social folder there. Then create a Dockerfile in that directory with the appropriate configuration for your social application. You'd typically use a command like:

docker build -t social-container .

Then to run it with the directory mounted:

docker run -v $(pwd)/social:/app social-container

This would mount your local social directory to the container's app directory. Make sure your Dockerfile is properly configured for your specific social application requirements.
